thread.title: House Oversight Chairman Won’t Open Investigation Into Mike Flynn Situation
thread.title_full: House Oversight Chairman Won’t Open Investigation Into Mike Flynn Situation

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: House Oversight Chairman Won’t Open Investigation Into Mike Flynn Situation
text:
09:18pm February 14,   
Some have been calling for Jason Chaffetz and the House Oversight Committee to investigate the Mike Flynn situation now that Flynn has resigned. 
Looks like that ain’t happenin… 
From The Blaze : 
Calls for investigations into former White House National Security adviser Michael Flynn erupted after it was revealed that Flynn had “inadvertently briefed the Vice President Elect and others with incomplete information” in phone calls with Russian Ambassador Sergey Kislyak. 
However, if Republicans are hoping House Oversight Committee Chairman Jason Chaffetz (R-Utah) will take up the investigation, they will be sorely disappointed. According to The Hill , Chaffetz has stated that he has no intention of having his committee look into Flynn, and instead will leave it up to the House Intelligence Committee. 
It has been really sad watching the liberal media freak out about this whole situation and pretend that they cared about things like this when Obama was president. 
Let’s also not forget that Flynn also worked under Obama. 
We will have to wait and see what happens here. 
Clearly, Democrats aren’t going to be quiet on this one. 
They are going to act like this every step of the way. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
